contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox road |province=QC |type=QC |route=359 |maint=Ministère des transports du Québec |map= |established= |decommissioned= |alternate_name= |length_km=31.7 |length_round=1 |length_ref=<ref>Ministère des transports, "Distances routières", page 102, Les Publications du Québec, 2005</ref> |direction_b=North |direction_a=South |terminus_b=[[Image:qc153.svg|15px]] in [[Shawinigan]] |terminus_a=[[Image:qc138.svg|15px]] in [[Champlain, Quebec|Champlain]]| |previous_type=QC |previous_route=358 |next_type=QC |next_route=360 |cities=[[Shawinigan]] |junction= [[Image:Quebec Autoroute 40.svg|15px]] near [[Champlain, Quebec|Champlain]] }} '''Route 359''' is a 32 km north-south regional road in [[Quebec]], [[Canada]], going from [[Champlain, Quebec|Champlain]] to [[Grand-Mère, Quebec|Grand-Mère]]. It is one of the direct roads linking [[Quebec Autoroute 40|Autoroute 40]] (exit 220) to the [[Shawinigan]]-Grand-Mère area. It goes through the villages of [[Saint-Luc-de-Vincennes, Quebec|Saint-Luc-de-Vincennes]] and [[Lac-à-la-Tortue, Quebec|Lac-à-la-Tortue]]. ==Municipalities along Route 359== * [[Champlain, Quebec|Champlain]] * [[Saint-Luc-de-Vincennes, Quebec|Saint-Luc-de-Vincennes]] * [[Saint-Narcisse, Quebec|Saint-Narcisse]] * [[Shawinigan]] ==Major intersections== {| class=wikitable ![[List of regional county municipalities and equivalent territories in Quebec|RCM]] or [[List of regional county municipalities and equivalent territories in Quebec|ET]] !Municipality !Km !Road !Notes |- 352 / Route 359 overlap |- |[[Saint-Narcisse, Quebec|Saint-Narcisse]] |{{Jctint/type|concur}}|16.6 |{{Jctint/type|concur}}|{{jct|state=QC|Route|352}} |{{Jctint/type|concur}}|Northern terminus of Route
